title: Quadratic Equation Solutions
description: Find all real solutions to the quadratic equation: x² - 5x + 6 = 0
solution: To solve x² - 5x + 6 = 0, we can factor: (x - 2)(x - 3) = 0. Therefore x = 2 or x = 3.

title: Triangle Area Calculation
description: A triangle has sides of length 5, 12, and 13. Calculate its area using Heron's formula.
solution: First check if it's a right triangle: 5² + 12² = 25 + 144 = 169 = 13². Yes! So area = (1/2) × 5 × 12 = 30.

title: Probability of Two Dice
description: What is the probability of rolling two dice and getting a sum of 7?
solution: There are 6 ways to get sum 7: (1,6), (2,5), (3,4), (4,3), (5,2), (6,1). Total outcomes = 36. Probability = 6/36 = 1/6.
